title: Ping Problems
body:
I have a question for anyone that may be able to help.

Earlier today, I have been playing LoL and all of the sudden, my ping went from 60 to 120 ms. 120 ms ping may be good but when your used to small ping, it really makes a difference.

Upon checking my computer, I have no backgrounp apps running, no downloads, and just LoL running. I even deleted Steam to see if it would fix it but nothing helps. Tried resetting the router, ipconfig, etc. 

I have been playing for around 5-7 months now and would like a solution. Anything helps so...

replies.body: Annndddd... Here we are again folks. Barely was 4 months before the problem started again. Always seems to start after a 500ms DC from the league servers. This time its taking a lot longer to fix itself.
GREAT NEWS, My ping has finally dropped back to its 70-80 range. Any change for anyone else?

>
> GREAT NEWS, My ping has finally dropped back to its 70-80 range. Any change for anyone else?

How mate?
Just did the day of patch 6.7 (before the actual patch though)

I saw a few people with their own solutions but those haven't worked for me, however they are:
Reinstall LoL (only worked for one guy i saw so far and returns to bad ping whenever he restarts his computer)
Switch to an Ethernet cable instead of wifi.

Personally been having the same problem the move improved my ping and got me back into LoL but now I have an even higher ping than before the move and my internet speed increasing (used to get stable 120 ping with only a 2mb/1mb dl/up setup with the old server position)
Changed to 80 after the net upgrade and server move, now I can't get below 130 ping and I'm just waiting for aurelion sol before i stop playing again.
I hope we get some hlep tho
Bump! Plz anyone is welcome to contribute. This problem has been affecting my gameplay. Also,I confirm SorionHex's comment; this only happens with LoL.

Have been having this same problem for a little over a week now. I've noticed it's only with League. I've got 80 Ping (Stable and low considering the server switch) and I've got a 100Mbs connection that doesn't have any problems whatsoever on any other game or application.
